com.facebook.buck.distributed

Interface ArtifactCacheByBuildRule

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DistBuildArtifactCacheImpl, NoopArtifactCacheByBuildRule

    public interface ArtifactCacheByBuildRule
extends AutoCloseable
    Interface for a wrapper around the ArtifactCache, which Stampede uses to query remote and local caches separately, using the BuildRule directly.
